item.description:
Have a long run to get in on Sunday?
Kind of tough to enjoy (or suffer through) by yourself?
I propose we gut it out together!!
I'll be posting an invite for a long run each week until early October, join me!!

Depending on just how hot it is this Sunday, we may decide to push it back a tad to let the sun go down as much as possible.

Email me if you have a route suggestion for this weeks LSD.


cheers,
jess

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Sunday late afternoon/early evening long run
